involved_elements: Edge ID: af1c614e-f240-4c67-b387-07326bd7708b (Contradictory information -> Incomplete Information)
issues.proposed_solution: Remove one of the two bidirectional 'related_to' edges between Incomplete Information and Contradictory information as they represent the same relationship.
Remove one of the 'is_a' relationships as they create a circular definition. Keep only one direction, likely 'Scaling is_a Data Scaling' should be removed, and 'Data Scaling is_a Scaling' kept.

involved_elements: Edge ID: 9f30b0b9-65c4-4b53-ab8e-2841ce4d993e (Natural Language Ambiguity <-> Ambiguity in natural language)
Edge ID: 3c1a9ba1-626b-4b75-b44f-96905eac8c3c (Ambiguity in natural language -> Natural Language Ambiguity)
issues.proposed_solution: These nodes have both a bidirectional 'similar_to' relationship and a unidirectional 'is_a' relationship. Keep only the 'is_a' relationship for clarity as it's more specific.

involved_elements: Edge ID: 20f68d68-8a31-4f3e-99f7-6f58ca25e7e1 (Ambiguity in natural language <-> Natural language)
Edge ID: 2cd36683-6b86-4cb5-9c14-04e228e32b60 (Ambiguity in natural language -> Natural language)
issues.proposed_solution: The bidirectional 'related_to' and unidirectional 'part_of' relationships between the same nodes are redundant. Keep only the more specific 'part_of' relationship.

involved_elements: Edge ID: 0ea428cf-66f5-482f-9be9-14cd0ed90de0 (Large volumes of data -> Data Scaling)
Edge ID: 34e45e11-946d-4bc2-83de-3cad41b7a2e1 (Data Scaling -> Large volumes of data)
Edge ID: 137817be-6278-4cb6-91dc-8eb2a95e670e (Scaling -> Large volumes of data)
issues.proposed_solution: The relationships between Large volumes of data, Data Scaling, and Scaling are inconsistent. Edge 0ea428cf has 'causes' direction, while 34e45e11 has 'related_to' in the opposite direction. Standardize these relationships by keeping the causal relationship and removing the related_to relationship.
The 'purpose' attribute contains duplicate values with slight wording differences. Keep only one version of the purpose statement.

There should be a relationship between 'Knowledge Graph' (singular) and 'Knowledge Graphs' (plural) nodes, as they represent the same concept. Either merge these nodes or create an 'is_a' or 'equivalent_to' relationship between them.
The attribute of Entity Linking states it's 'related_to: Entity Resolution', but there's no edge connecting these nodes. Add a 'related_to' edge between Entity Linking and Entity Resolution.

Knowledge Graph has an attribute 'relationship: target for integration of extracted information', but there's no direct edge connecting Information Extraction to Knowledge Graph. Add a relationship to represent this integration.
